entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
